15 double MotorPowerFactor::calculate() {
16  if (std::abs(loadFactor) < 0.001) {
25  MotorEfficiency motorEfficiency(lineFrequency, motorRpm, efficiencyClass, motorRatedPower);
26  motorEfficiency.calculate(0.25, specifiedEfficiency);
27  motorKwInput = motorEfficiency.getKWloss0();
28  motorkVA = 460 * sqrt(3) * motorCurrent / 1000;
29  return motorKwInput / motorkVA;
30  }
35  return (loadFactor * motorRatedPower * 0.746) /
36  (motorCurrent * motorEfficiency * ratedVoltage * std::sqrt(3) / 1000);
37 }
